Related Experience

Ruby on Rails Developer
Jackrabbit Systems
Santa Fe, NM
Nov 2014 - Apr 2016

  • Summary
    Developed and maintained many features accross the stack (primarily backend) for a large Rails app powering Jackrabbit's Meta › Direct product and the RESTful JSON API for Book › Direct. This includes extensive use of data modeling, automated testing, background job processing, responsive markup, and more.
  • Highlights
    • Utilized the RSpec testing library to ensure 100% code coverage.
    • During times of demand I worked on minor features for Jackrabbit's AngularJS based Book › Direct front-end, without prior Angular knowledge.
    • Worked under the AGILE Scrum practice and the JIRA tracking system.
    • Worked remotely roughly 60% of the time, while able to collaborate effectively with team members and project management.
    • Gained new responsibilities as time went on: Helped other developers on a regular basis (particularily with Rails back-end), performed code reviews, and production deploys.
  • Reason For Leaving
    Strong desire to relocate from my homeland of New Mexico. Due to an alignment of favorable circumstances at the time (that may not exist in the future), I went on a sabattical abroad in Central America before making a relocation. However, I also used the time to expand my coding skills and developed a cool pet project.
